城市数据开放沙龙

Oct 22, 2013

#79 The Bike Index

Seth Herr will be talking about the Bike Index, an open source bike registry to fight bike theft. Herr & co just had super successful Kickstarter campaign.

Links

  • The Bike Index
  • Github repo

6pm
Oct 22, 2013

Braintree office
222 W Merchandise Mart Plz 8th Floor
Chicago, IL

Food provided by Thoughtworks
Read our Code of Conduct

Video
Christopher Whitaker from the Smart Chicago Collaborative records and livestreams our presentations. Watch them on YouTube!
